summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue North from East McGraw Street to East Boston Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sanitary and storm sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16581 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
